attributes.action: overturn Natural Englands revoking GL04,GL05 and GL06 for no legal reason
attributes.additional_details:
The information appeared on your own website today ,not in the public news.This ill thought idea is in response to a so called "celebrity" trying to ban shooting and not the actual law.By cancelling these laws and removing crop protection by responsible people the food supply of this country is put in jeopardy .
No counter proposal or new licence is available just a promise of a "response" iin 30 days ,this is totally unacceptable and is putting livelyhoods at risk
attributes.background:
Natural England ,has given 0nly 2 days notice they are cancelling licences to control bird pests damaging crops and poisoning animal feed with their droppings on farms and in feed stores .
No consultation ,no warning ,farms will be put at risk due to financial loss and spread of disease
